name: 01-building-blocks
on: push

jobs:
    echo-hello:
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
        steps:
            - name: Say Hello
              run: echo "Hello, World!"
    echo-goodbye:
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
        steps:
            - name: Successful Step
              run: |
                echo "I will succeed"
            - name: say Goodbye
              run: echo "Goodbye, World!"
